articles.description: The Blades' winless run extended to five matches with a 1-0 defeat at Coventry City last night
articles.content:
Sheffield United missed the chance to return to the top of the Championship following defeat at Coventry City last night.
The game looked to be heading for a bore draw until Martyn Waghorn's 87th-mi… [+5683 chars]

articles.author: Andrew French
articles.title: Watford fans at South Bermondsey station before half time - Watford Observer
articles.description: Disillusioned Watford fans left The Den before half-time last night and were catching trains back from Millwall before the second half started
articles.content: It may be one of the shorter away trips for Watford fans this season, but some were so upset by the performance at Millwall they left the ground early enough to be back home before they would do for … [+1536 chars]
